statements: SELECT * FROM support_tickets;
SELECT customer_name, priority, created_at FROM support_tickets WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, ticket_description FROM support_tickets ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT customer_name, status FROM support_tickets WHERE priority = 'High' ORDER BY customer_name ASC, created_at DESC;
SELECT MAX(created_at) AS latest_ticket FROM support_tickets;
SELECT * FROM support_tickets WHERE priority = 'High' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, status FROM support_tickets WHERE status = 'Closed' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, ticket_description FROM support_tickets WHERE priority = 'Medium' AND status = 'Open' ORDER BY ticket_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM support_tickets WHERE status = 'Open' AND priority = 'Low' ORDER BY created_at DESC, customer_name ASC;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, status, created_at FROM support_tickets WHERE priority IN ('High', 'Medium') ORDER BY created_at DESC, ticket_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM tickets;
SELECT customer_name, issue_description FROM tickets WHERE status='Open';
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE customer_name='John Doe';
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description, created_at FROM tickets ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, issue_description, status FROM tickets WHERE status='Open' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, issue_description FROM tickets ORDER BY ticket_id DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, issue_description FROM tickets WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, issue_description, created_at FROM tickets WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT t.ticket_id, t.customer_name, r.responder_name FROM tickets t INNER JOIN responses r ON t.ticket_id = r.ticket_id ORDER BY t.created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM support_tickets ORDER BY priority DESC, created_at ASC
SELECT customer_name, status FROM support_tickets WHERE status = 'Open'
SELECT customer_name, created_at FROM support_tickets WHERE priority = 'High'
SELECT * FROM ticket_responses ORDER BY response_time DESC
SELECT responder_name, response_text, response_time FROM ticket_responses WHERE responder_name = 'Alice'
SELECT * FROM support_tickets WHERE status = 'Open' ORDER BY priority DESC, created_at ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, ticket_description FROM support_tickets WHERE status = 'Closed' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, status FROM support_tickets WHERE priority = 'High' AND status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY created_at ASC
SELECT * FROM ticket_responses WHERE response_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY response_time DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT ticket_id, responder_name, response_text FROM ticket_responses ORDER BY ticket_id, response_time
SELECT * FROM Tickets ORDER BY created_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, issue_description FROM Tickets WHERE status = 'Open'
SELECT responder_name, response_text, response_date FROM Responses WHERE response_date >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 WEEK
SELECT agent_name, specialization FROM Agents ORDER BY agent_name
SELECT department_name, manager_name FROM Departments
SELECT * FROM Tickets WHERE status = 'Open' ORDER BY created_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name FROM Tickets WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY ticket_id ASC
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description, status FROM Tickets ORDER BY status, ticket_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT r.response_id, t.ticket_id, r.responder_name FROM Responses r JOIN Tickets t ON r.ticket_id = t.ticket_id WHERE r.response_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY t.ticket_id ASC
SELECT a.agent_name, a.specialization, d.department_name FROM Agents a INNER JOIN Departments d ON a.agent_id = d.department_id ORDER BY a.agent_name
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customer ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT registration_date, customer_name FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT attachment_url, attachment_type FROM Attachment WHERE uploaded_by = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM Customer
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customer ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description, status FROM Ticket WHERE status = 'Open' ORDER BY created_date DESC
SELECT feedback_id, ticket_id, rating, feedback_text FROM Feedback WHERE rating >= 4
SELECT attachment_id, attachment_url, attachment_type, upload_date FROM Attachment ORDER BY upload_date
